LanguageData.VQEA_SplicelingContainment.label: spliceling containment
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicelingContainment.description: A containment pod filled with murky liquid. It seems a sleeping spliceling lies inside.
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicehulkContainment.label: splicehulk containment
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicehulkContainment.description: A containment pod filled with murky liquid. A large splicehulk fills up almost the entire tube.
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicefiendContainment.label: splicefiend containment
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicefiendContainment.description: A containment pod filled with murky liquid. The glass bursts at the seams due to the large splicefiend inside.
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicetootsContainment.label: splicetoots containment
LanguageData.VQEA_SplicetootsContainment.description: A containment pod filled with murky liquid. Several small splicetoots float around in it, restlessly.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientEmergencyPurifier.label: ancient emergency purifier
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientEmergencyPurifier.descriptio: An old automatic purifier that releases extreme heat bursts to sterilize contaminated areas. It still activates on a timed cycle.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientEmergencyPurifier_Off.label: ancient emergency purifier
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientEmergencyPurifier_Off.descri: An old automatic purifier that releases extreme heat bursts to sterilize contaminated areas. It still activates on a timed cycle.
